Name: KUTCHINA FRYPAN 22 CM
Short description: Made using 4-layered advanced Nano technology, the Kutchina Fry Pan 22 cm lets you fry vegetables or prepare scrambled eggs, pancakes, and other delicacies. The soft-touch handle is not just stylish but it also provides a comfortable and stable hold to the pan. Thanks to the 4-layer non-stick coating, you can prepare your meals using less oil. As the food doesn’t stick to the cooking surface, cleaning the frypan is very easy. This fry pan is compatible with induction cooktops as well as gas stoves. It is also metal spoon-friendly. Featuring a stylish marble finish interior and stunning exterior, this fry pan will add a charm to your kitchen. It comes with a two years warranty.
Description: ['4-layer food-grade non-stick coating: The 4-layered non-stick coating of Kutchina Fry Pan 22 cm is made using-advanced Nano technology, which makes it ideal for everyday use. The non-stick coating promotes healthy cooking by letting you cook with less oil. ', 'Soft-touch handle: The stylish soft-touch handle assures long-term usage. It is thoughtfully designed to resist heat and protect your hands from burns while cooking. It provides an ergonomic and stable grip. ', 'Versatile: The versatile fry pan is ideal for frying, sauteing, and browning foods. Suitable for frying foods at high temperatures. Besides, the pan is lightweight, perfect for dishes that require tossing.', 'Durable performance: The high-quality material used in the making of this fry pan ensures high performance and durability. ', 'PFOA-free: The fry pan by Kutchina is PFOA-free, ensuring that the quality of food cooked is well-maintained. ', 'Metal spoon-friendly: The thick non-stick coating of the fry pan is metal spoon friendly. ', 'Compatible base: The fry pan is compatible with induction cooktops and gas stoves. It spreads the heat uniformly, thereby reducing burn marks.', 'Aesthetics: Apart from being highly functional, the fry pan is stylish as well. The exquisite blue metallic paint and marble finish in the interior add to the overall appearance of the cookware. The sleek and shiny appeal of the fry pan provides an elegant look to your kitchen. ', 'Warranty: The beautifully designed fry pan comes with a two years warranty.']
Technical specification: ['Stylish Soft touch Handle', 'Lasting 4 year Non stick coating', 'Metal Spoon Friendly', 'Induction Base Compatible', 'Marble Finish', 'PFOA free', 'Food Safe Coating', '2 year Warranty']

Name: KUTCHINA FRYPAN 26 CM
Short description: Prepare a wide variety of vegetables and meat by sauteing, stir-frying, or shallow frying with the Kutchina Fry Pan 26 cm. Made using 4-layered advanced Nano technology, the non-stick coating of the fry pan allows you to cook with less oil. The rounded sides of the fry pan ensure less spills and splatters over the countertop. It is compatible with both induction and gas stoves. The aesthetic design, soft-touch handle, blue glossy metal, and exquisite marble finish is sure to add a modern touch to your kitchen. The PFOA free cookware is safe for everyday use. It is metal spoon friendly as well. It comes with a two years warranty.

Name: KUTCHINA NON STICK FRYPAN 24 CM
Short description: Kutchina Fry Pan 24 cm is not just good looking but it also promotes healthy cooking. Thanks to 4-layered non-stick coating made using advanced Nano technology, you can make a variety of dishes on this fry pan using less oil. As the food doesn’t stick to the bottom of the fry pan it is quite easy to clean. The added height and round sides ensure less food spillage. Perfect for those who seek durable performance, this cookware is free of PFOA-free, making it safe for everyday use. The stylish soft-touch handle offers a firm and smooth grip. The product is compatible for a gas stove and an induction cooktop. Not just that, it is also metal spoon-friendly. This product comes with a warranty of two years.
Description: ['4 layer food-grade non-stick coating: The 4-layered non-stick coating is food-grade safe, ensuring the quality of your food is maintained well. ', 'Versatile: The cookware is versatile and is ideal for searing, frying, or sauteing foods.
